NomaiObject: solely 1 FILIX: What a marvelous device the Nomai here have constructed... This locator enables us to track and study the Quantum Moon so much more easily! 2 1 MELORAE: You are all welcome to visit Ember Twin at anytime to use it for your studies! I look forward to any exciting discoveries about the Quantum Moon your fresh perspectives might bring! 3 2 FILIX: Friends, I believe I may have found something of note. 4 3 FILIX: I was watching the Quantum Moon for some time during a rest with the help of the locator, and noticed that the moon appears to choose different orbits around a single planet as it likes! 5 4 BUR: What a fascinating discovery, Filix! So the Quantum Moon not only orbits in quantum superposition across the star system; even its orbits are quantum as well! (I fear this discovery only makes travel to the moon by shuttle even more daunting..) 6 5 FILIX: An update: Curiously, the Quantum Moon appears to always orbit around the equator of Giant's Deep! It appears to be the only planet that the Quantum Moon has a consistently equatorial orbit around. 7 6 ANNONA: How peculiar. Perhaps Giant's Deep's great gravitational pull allows it to always pull the Quantum Moon into this equatorial orbit. LC EX2 5
